mapper.select: select c.cpColor,c.cNo,c.pCode,pf.pfRealName, p.pName, p.pPrice, c.cQty, (c.cQty*p.pPrice) from product p, cart c, productfile pf, user u, productoption po where pf.pCode = p.pCode and p.pCode = c.pCode and u.uid = c.uid and c.cpColor = po.pColor and pf.pCode = c.pCode and po.pCode = p.pCode and u.uid = 'donghyun'
